verses.text: And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* that \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with me came \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w waked|strong="H5782"\w* me, as a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that is \w wakened|strong="H5782"\w* out of his \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, What \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* thou? And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and behold a \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* all \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, with a \w bowl|strong="H1531"\w* upon the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of it, and his \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* thereon, and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w pipes|strong="H4166"\w* to the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w*, which \add are\add* upon the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* thereof:\f + \fr 4.2 \ft a bowl: Heb. her bowl\f*\f + \fr 4.2 \ft seven pipes…: or, seven several pipes to the lamps\f*

And \w two|strong="H8147"\w* olive \w trees|strong="H2132"\w* by it, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* upon the \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \add side\add* of the \w bowl|strong="H1543"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* upon the \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \add side\add* thereof.

So I \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* that \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add are\add* these, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*?

Then the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* that \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with me \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Knowest|strong="H3045"\w* thou not what these be? And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, No, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*.

Then he \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* unto \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Not by \w might|strong="H2428"\w*, nor by \w power|strong="H3581"\w*, but by my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.  +  r 4.6  t might: or, army *

Who \add art\add* thou, O \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*? \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* \add thou shalt become\add* a \w plain|strong="H4334"\w*: and he shall bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w headstone|strong="H0068"\w* \add thereof with\add* \w shoutings|strong="H8663"\w*, \add crying\add*, \w Grace|strong="H2580"\w*, \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* unto it.
Moreover the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

The \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* have laid the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* of this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* shall also \w finish|strong="H1214"\w* it; and thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me unto you.

For who hath \w despised|strong="H0936"\w* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of small \w things|strong="H6996"\w*? for they shall \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, and shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w plummet|strong="H0068"\w* in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* \add with\add* those \w seven|strong="H7651"\w*; they \add are\add* the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which run to and \w fro|strong="H7751"\w* through the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 4.10 \ft for they…: or, since the seven eyes of the \+nd LORD\+nd* shall rejoice\f*\f + \fr 4.10 \ft plummet: Heb. stone of tin\f*

¶ Then \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* I, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, What \add are\add* these \w two|strong="H8147"\w* olive \w trees|strong="H2132"\w* upon the \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \add side\add* of the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* and upon the \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \add side\add* thereof?

And I \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w again|strong="H8145"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, What \add be these\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w branches|strong="H7641"\w* which \w through|strong="H3027"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w pipes|strong="H6804"\w* \w empty|strong="H7324"\w* the \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \add oil\add* out of themselves?\f + \fr 4.12 \ft through: Heb. by the hand of\f*\f + \fr 4.12 \ft empty…: or, empty out of themselves oil into the gold\f*\f + \fr 4.12 \ft the golden oil: Heb. the gold\f*

And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* me and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Knowest|strong="H3045"\w* thou not what these \add be\add*? And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, No, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he, These \add are\add* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w anointed|strong="H3323"\w* \w ones|strong="H1121"\w*, that \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* by the \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* of the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 4.14 \ft anointed…: Heb. sons of oil\f*
